DOC.HEADLINE: PAPERBACKS
DOC.TEXT: AMERICAN CIVIL WAR REPORTS AS RECORDED IN HARPER ' S WEEKLY edited by Sidney Rudeau ( Historical Briefs Inc. , Box 629 , 260 Madalyn Ave. , Verplanck , N.Y. 10596 : $ 24.95 ; 224 pp. , paperback original ) . These accounts from " A Journal of Civilization " give the reader a sense of the War as contemporary readers knew it . In addition to news_stories and dispatches , the reproduced magazine pages include commentaries , cartoons and advertisements ( a silver " Army " watch on a vest chain : $ 7 ) . The dramatic woodcuts of battles , generals , congressmen , private soldiers and escaped slaves provide a vivid pictorial compliment to the many written accounts of the Civil War .
